reviews.sentence: Harahs is the place for fun. A fun and exciting casino with an abundance of slot machines in different denominations and spacious rooms with comfort. The Waterfront Buffet is one of the best buffets around. Too bad they do not have a boardwalk or a beach and a bigger indoor pool for kids to enjoy.

Harahs Run Down. The rooms in Harahs older towers Marina and Harbor are old and in need of major renovation. Furniture is ripped and stained dirty. Paint stained and cracking. Bathroom fixtures are broken. Bathroom finish run down.

Harahs. dirty rooms. Never book on lower level floors. Furniture was missing from our room even someones dirty underwear behind our bathroom door. Never book a room in the Harbor or Marina towers they are the worst.
Harahs good hotel great restaurants. We like waterfront tower not lake view where we just stayed. they are newer and very nice. Old rooms were stuffy.

Nice Hotel. Rooms are divided into harbour tower being the least expensive marina tower bayview tower and waterfront being the higher prices. The hotel is nice. My problem was that we checked in the staff try to sell you upgrades at the front desk I decided to upgrade to the waterfront tower went into the room it looked as though someone slept on the bed and the room was dirty. I downgraded to the Marina tower again the same thing. I finally got a room in the bayview tower that was clean. Each time I went down to the front desk and complained no one bothered to apologize or to even acknowledge what I was saying. They just kept telling me Okay the new room cost will be this amount and as usual no manager was available or so they claimed. One hour later after struggling with my luggage from tower to tower I got a room. This was very aggravating for me. The staff really does not seem to care about you. Mind you I have been staying there for years and the service is getting worse not better.

We enjoyed our stay Ibrought 3 friends with me for my friends birthday. We enjoy buffets but I had a slot host come out she was nice new my name ask me if you needed anything I said to her a extra buffet we where there at Tropicana had Grand funk railroad but concert was too short had to buy tickets in advance so we like your rooms and you let me stay on weekends so even though I am retired sorta of a vacation just wish I hit like last month a thousand dollars on walking dead game but it is nice at HarahsCasino even though Tropicana is buying all mew games to compete to bright there but I one day in summer when at Harah check out Cesars take that but jity you have did you own Showboat it is too crowded their but I give you a A rating but sometimes we need a extrabed small cot type but it at a clean some people left garbage in Halways and elevator my one friend grime retired also lives in Egg Harbor he meets us their stay with us got the credit card with you but we had a good stay thanks although concert was short paid 75 for 2 tickets but it is a nicecasino we will be back I moved to poconos Pennsylvania longer ride than NYC.

Still the best in AC. Stayed at Harahs 2 nights with friends. We were both on the 33rd floor of the Water Towers. Room had great views of the city and bay. On Thursday met for drinks and ate at the buffet. Choices were abundant and very tasty. Gambled the night away. Friday the guys went on a 12 day flounder fishing trip while the girls went to the pool. Gambled. At 70pm met at the Steak House. The Chilean Sea Bass was delicious but a small serving for the price. Filet Mignon topped with Lump Crab was out of the ball park. After dinner we went to see Legends and had a great show and even got pictures with Michael J and The Blues Brothers. Then gambled. On Saturday had the breakfast buffet said good bye to our friends gambled and stared our drive home. Over all good friends great venue and even came home a winer.

The decline of Harahs. I was shocked that Harahs has gone so downhill. I had not been there in exactly two years and this was an awful homecoming to a place I used to visit three times a year. The rooms we had three rooms in the Harbour tower were dirty with stains on the floors one looked like blood and very unpredictable air conditioning in all three rooms. The bathroom door in one room could not open all the way because it hit the toilet at the halfway mark. The beds were all mismatched and maybe just too old and over used not at all comfortable and we could hear every room around us flushing all night. The cafe tazo place messed up our orders for breakfast both mornings. The highlight was dinner at martoranos food was great but they told me they had no more high chairs available for my one year old. I very nicely told the waitress that is not ok and she must have gone to another restaurant to borrow one and came in with it hosed off and soaking wet. My mother and I used wipes and table napkins to finish cleaning it.

Holiday visit. Overall my experience was quite comfortable and enjoyable. My room accommodations were pleasant however the Harbour tower room is showing a bit of age and the could have been cleaner dust in some regards and the bathroom was in need of some TLC.

Filthy room. I have been to Harah ’s numerous times for the nightlife however I have never stayed there. I recently stayed for a few days for a business conference at the convention center. The room in the “ Harbour ” tower was in the filthy. There was mold in the shower and the shower head was hanging off the wall. There was a build up of dust on the very worn furniture pic. The incredibly filthy carpet was even more apparent because furniture had been moved. PicI would not even sit on the couch as it was stained. The shower did not drain well. For some reason there was no air conditioning in the hallway. Check in can be anywhere from 4 8pm. Our friends did not get in their room until 730 at night. They stayed in the Marina tower and their room was just as bad. In addition you do not need a “ key ” to go up the elevator so security is a concern. The ONLY positive was that the beds were comfortable.

Overnight getaway. Location is in the marina section of AC not on the boardwalk. This is preferred by my wife and I You can take the jitneys to most areas for a small fee. We were upgraded to a very nice room on the 45th floor overlooking ocean an bay. Harahs was very quit at night unlike some of the other casinos. GREAT EXPERIENCE.

Great vacation spot. My room was nice I should of gotten a room with a ocean view. Only bad time I had was losing my money on playing blackjack it ugly down there smh. Other than that I really enjoyed myself. There are tables games in the pool and I like that.

Fabulous place Great crew. Ocean Tower great view it was like a home in a hotel. Room attendants remembered me every day and ask if they could help me in any way let them no. I even got locked out and one of the House keeping employees let me into my room with out and hassles.

3 day stay at Harahs Resort in Atlantic City. The experience was enjoyable from start to finish. We were able to check in early and get our room right away. Room was fantastic with a great view of the bay and the ocean. Lots of venues to eat and drink. The pool was a wonderful bonus. Lots of areas to gamble and play whatever kind of casino games or slots we desired.

Two thumbs up for Harahs resort. I enjoyed everything the resort provided us with complimentary valet parking throughout duration of stay for 50 one time fee room service daily clean facilities and comfortable. They offered crib for my baby But above all the prices were extremely affordable it makes it so much better of an experience. Overall it was an amazing experience at Harahs Resort. The rooms were lovely staffing very friendly and courteous very close to a variety of attractions including beach and famous Jersey boardwalk. Family friendly and seperate adult amenities to enjoy as well including casino.

Going back. We needed a distraction and could n’t have chosen a nicer place. A walk along the bay great dining and a wonderful clean spacious room. Did I mention the indoor pool with its own gardens. We recommend.

Great stay. Our room was big about 500 sq ft. Beautiful view of the bay. They have great food court and poker tables. The oasis pool are for 21 and older which was a bummer we had to take our kids to the family game center. The pool smelled bad not sure if water was filtered our clean. It grossed me out a little bit. Overall we had a great experience at Harahs Atlantic City.

A Nice Place To Spend A Day. I am a Diamond member so I do not have to pay the aggravating resort fees. The rooms are nice and there are very good places to eat. The Waterfront Buffet is excellent but may be considered pricey. My wife and I normally have a comp for buffet. There are plenty of different slots. The staff is friendly and helpful. It is nice to go outside and look at the bay.
The gentleman at the reception was very nice talking to us at late check in. Bedroom is alright with partial ocean view. Casino layout is pretty easy to understand.

Great get away. The Harahs resort in Atlantic City is always an enjoyable experience. From the cleanliness of the rooms to the choice or restaurants and help from staff we never have a bad experience at Harahs. The rooms on the upper floors have great views of the bay or the ocean and boardwalk. The public transportation systems make it easy to leave the resort without having to drive.
